titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: <*> Jan 16 = "Mandua Mandua"? s2: <*> Aug 3 = "Edpesworthotown"? no idea what this is s4: <*> April 15 = "Pluto"? <*> April 20 = "Floatinpex"? <*> under Jan 20 = "40"? not a real date <*> May 16 = "North"? <*> May 16 = whole note difficult to read

body.ab:
1936 GILLIE D.R. Esq 15 quai de Bourbon VIe 3 m 1 v 40 dep 30
Jan 25 Seven Types of Ambiguity Feb 12 Feb. 12 C.S. Vells, Autobiography vol I 12 Feb 17 " " vol II 22 22 The Task of Social Hygiene Feb 25 22 Portraits 30cm Feb 25 25 Curzon, H. Nicolson March 2nd March 2. History of Europe in the 19 C. Circe. April 9 April 9 Alice James overdue Ap. 16 Notes of a Son & Brother 2 16 Celebrated Trials vol I 9.50 pd 2 April 25 - July 25. 40 frs. May 2~ Meaning of Meaning. 16 May 16(G. Meredith ? which) 6 frs. June 13. fr. June 13. 42nd Parallel sent pc. July 7 July 15. July 15. Emperor's Tigers. Sept 30 September 30 - December 30. 40 fr. Sept 30 Eternal Moment Oct 3 Oct 3 Love letters of T. Carlyle + T. Welsh Oct 29 29 Arabia Deserta vol II Dec 12 bought Time + Tide owes 5.00 1 Dec 12 God without Thunder. Dec. 31 Renewed. Jan 16 - April 16 40v. Jan 16 <*> Feb 4 16 Little Boy lost. 4.
Feb. 4. Europa Feb 11 Feb 11 Chaucer. Livingston Lowes. Feb 17. 17 Original Letters from India_ March 13 March 13 Life of Charles Doughty April 1 April 1 Friendly Tree April 15 15 Busman's Honeymoon. April 20 20 Letters of Gertrude Bell Vol I May 1 May 1 Letters of G. Bell Vol II May 13 Renewed April 16 - July 16 1937 65v
May 13 Abinger Harvest June 4 Paid 3.50 fr for over time June 4 Brazilian Adventure June 11 June 11 The Daring Young Man and Other Stories July 2. July 2. New Letters & Memorials of Jane Welsh July 16 Carlyle vol I 16 Gertrude Bell. Early letters. July 23. 23 Phoenix Aug 5 27 sent p.c. closing. Aug 3 12.30 from heaven sent p.c. returned Blackbook of <*> to concierge Secret journey. on Nov 24th House of the 4 winds Renewed November 15 1937 - Feb 15 1938 65v (pd. Dec 7) old book subsc Dec 7 Winged Pharoah (2v) owe 30 Dec 22 22 The Wind Blows Over Jan. 17 Jan. 17 Hobbes' Leviathan Feb 12 Feb 12 Crime & Custom in Savage Society Feb. 22 " 12 Epic of Creation Febr. 22 Renewed. Febr. 15. - May 15. 1938. 65 frc. Febr. 22. Sherston's Progress. April 15
to Nov 15 1939 GILLIE D.R. Esq. 15, quai de Bourbon IVe. june 29. South riding 29 Way and its power. july 24 p.c. July 20th July 24 Milarepa Oct. 24 Wonderful Adventure of Nils William Shakespeare, Chambers Oct. 24 2 vols p.c. Oct 10 also Mme Roger Levy will get his address Flying Officer Gillie Corps d'Imprèles SB wrote Oct 21 E.M. Air Régional to Gillie Secteur Postale 142
Mlle Madeleine David 126 Bd Haussmann 'el Laborde 72.93 preferably lunch time Nov 9 Mr Gillie came - said had lent to lady who was having a baby the day the war broke out - she went to Fontainebleau. He hopes to get back book some day Wonderful Adventures of Nils not returned
to Nov 15 GILLIE 1938 April 15 <*> Caesar (extra) paid Apr. 20 Apr 20 Found <*> paid Apr 24 24 Gerard Manley Hopkins May 30 May 30 All Men are Brothers July 26 (50 fr. on 6m. 1 vol. account subscription renewed) December 7 Renewed May 15 - November 15 1938 115 paid 50 paid July 30 bal. due 65 July 20 CRYSTAL CABINET Sept 3 July 30 Essays Ancient and Modern, Eliot Sept 3 Some Versions of Pastoral Sept 3 Richard Jeffries Sept 3 Life of Charles Lord Metcalfe Sept 3 Oct 20 God Without Thunder Jan 9 sub ren Nov 15th - May 15th 115v Jan 9 Helen's Tower Jan 7 17 Age of Innocence Jan 20 20 House of Mirth Mar. 4 Mar <*> Folklore of the Old Testament April 19 Mr. Gillie paid for Miss Ben Torim's book not returned 105v less dep 50 50 also paid 7v fine 55 for himself) Apr 19 Collect Poems Yeats May 16 May 16 To the <*> June 17 16 Beginning June 17 p.c. June 14. sub. dued S: <*> May 15th June 17 Goldsworthy Lowes Dickinson June 29 Renewed May 15 - November 15 1939 115v 1 v A
